content: शार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [शार्-अच् शॄ-घञ् वा] {@--1@} Variegated, speckled, mottled, spotted. {@--2@} Yellow. --रः {@--1@} A variegated colour. {@--2@} Green colour. {@--3@} Air, wind. {@--4@} A piece used at chess, a chessman; कालः काल्या भुवनफलके त्रीडति प्रणिशारैः <ls>Bh. 3. 39.</ls> {@--5@} Injuring, hurting
